description: get Order Delete notification. For permission is controlled by App level

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Format in seconds

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access. Used to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple call and expire in 4 hours

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for shop APIs

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The last notification_id retrieved on the page before using the cursor field(returns last seen notification_id by default). When using cursor as cursor is provided, the latest message from the index will be returned

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Some notification may be attached with URL, it will redirect to other center
